Text:
Yea fire punch starts really strong , but gets a bit whacky in the end.
Chainsaw man on the other hand , it’s fucking amazing
Fire punch looks good but by god it seems like the weirdest thing i'll ever read
Tastsuki is a weird dude his Twitter account is him role playing as his imaginary 8 year old sister
Just so you know Mappa has been discussing if they could animate ALL of Tatsuki Fujimoto's works. It's not 100% confirmed but there is a very high possibility all his one shots will be animated.
I'd love to see you all do Gigguk's "The ACTUAL Top 20 Anime Every Fan Needs to Watch" it's one of my favorites and gives insight into what all you have seen.
The sister or the dogs. What a choice.
7:11 I hear Kingdom Hearts music in the background!
I'm reading firepunch right now and for being one of his earlier works it's still really good and is a psychological insight on how far humanity would go in desperate times.
Gigguk is the one that's insane ヾ(*’Ｏ’*)/
